Description.Text: Discover our welcoming Homewood Suites by Hilton Tyler hotel. Convenient to the Medical District and downtown, this chic hotel provides unique amenities and services such as executive boardroom suites, a sports court and grocery shopping. Count on us to share local tips as you explore our townâ??s famous Rose Garden, Azalea Trail and Goodman-LeGrand Museum.We offer a hot full breakfast each morning and an evening social* Monday â?? Thursday. You also can enjoy food from your kitchen or cooked on the barbeque grills.If youâ??re traveling on business, check out our executive boardroom suites. Each spacious suite features separate living and sleeping areas, two TVs, free internet access and a fully equipped kitchen â?? including all the utensils. Accessible suites, designed for wheelchair entry, have visual and audio communication devices.Plan your event in Tyler, Texas in our 600 sq. ft. meeting space, with A/V and catering options. The business center and its complimentary printing are always available. When youâ??re ready to unwind, work out in the fitness center or on the sports court, soak in the hot tub, or swim in the outdoor pool. Or you can choose to do all of these things during your extended stay at Homewood Suites Tyler.*Local and state laws apply.
